sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_apptmnt_booking_config</collection> <condition>current.task_table != "wm_order" || !GlidePluginManager.isActive("com.snc.fsm_capacity_management")</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_apptmnt_booking_config">availability_method=capacity_based^EQ<item display_value="Based on capacity" endquery="false" field="availability_method" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="capacity_based"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Check if config can be based on capacity</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { current.setAbortAction(true); if(current.task_table != "wm_order" && !GlidePluginManager.isActive("com.snc.fsm_capacity_management")) gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Capacity based configuration is supported for only {0} task table and requires {1} plugin enabled", ["Work Order", "Field Service Capacity and Reservations Management"]));
if(current.task_table != "wm_order") gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Capacity based configuration is supported for only {0} task table ", "Work Order"));
if(!GlidePluginManager.isActive("com.snc.fsm_capacity_management")) gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Capacity based configuration requires {0} plugin enabled", "Field Service Capacity and Reservations Management"));
gs.setRedirect(current);
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-20 09:30:33</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>12fa9f585bc70110461b52380a81c731</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Check if config can be based on capacity</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Appointment Booking" source="sn_apptmnt_booking">d0f0c1303ba23200ce8a4d72f3efc4ac</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Appointment Booking">d0f0c1303ba23200ce8a4d72f3efc4ac</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_12fa9f585bc70110461b52380a81c731</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-20 09:55:21</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=12fa9f585bc70110461b52380a81c731"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Check if config can be based on capacity
